projects:
[{'title': 'Introducing Performance Audit in the Chamber of Accounts', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Development and organisation of a 10-day study tour on Performance Auditing for 9 key staff in the Chamber of Accounts of Azerbaijan. The tour included visits to the UK National Audit Office, Audit Scotland and the National Audit Office in the Netherlands.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'MATRA Patrol PFM Training', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Responsible for the organisation and coordination of a 10-day PFM introduction training for a group of 25 government officials working in public finance management from south East Europe (Bosnia, Serbia, Montenegro, Turkey, Kosovo, Macedonia). This training was financed by the Netherlands Ministry of Foreign Affairs and facilitated by Ecorys. The training aimed to learn lessons from good practices in the Dutch system of Public Finance Management.
Main responsibilities: 
- Development and preparation  of  the overall training program
- Lead organiser: identifying and instructing  lecturers, arranging study visits, collecting training materials and setup of an e-learning environment;
- Preparation of training material on the Dutch budget cycle;
- Provided the training session on the Budge Cycle and budget preparation.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'Independent Final Evaluation of the Public Finance for Development Programme (UNDP)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'Final Evaluation of the Public Finance for Development Programme: “Strengthening Public Finance capacities in the Western Balkans and the Commonwealth of Independent States”, a programme financed by the Slovak Government and implemented by UNDP. Evaluation was focused on the 5 OECD evaluation criteria: relevance, effectiveness, efficiency, impact and sustainability. 
I supported the Team Leader of this evaluation with data collection, interpretation and analysis of data, and provided support in the elaboration of project evaluation sheets for individual selected interventions. 
', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'Summative Evaluation of the Afghanistan Programme (CIDA)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': "Assessment of the Afghanistan Program of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) for the period from 2004-05 to 2010-11. Summative evaluation of CIDA's Afghanistan programme in terms of the following six criteria: relevance, coherence, performance (effectiveness, efficiency, and economy), sustainability, management principles/Paris declaration, and crosscutting issues. As support to the core evaluation team, I was responsible for the project assessment forms, analysing the documents of 25 signature projects of CIDA in Afghanistan, including projects on Human Rights. Moreover, data analysis and converting bulks of data into readable charts. 
", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'Political economy analysis and fiscal space profiles of countries in Eastern and Southern Africa', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': None, 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'Public Financial Management Support Programme Pakistan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': "OPM (lead) and Ecorys are carrying out an ambitious 5-year PFM Support Programme in Pakistan. I was the project manager at Ecorys' side.

I joined the team after the inception phase. As member of the evaluation team, I am responsible for data collection, portfolio analysis, and preparation of the case studies. I was one of the team members for the field mission to Palestine in April 2016, which was one of the ten case studies.

Mission to Tanzania in January 2015 to contribute to development of M&E approach.

As Junior Evaluator in the team, I provided assistance to development of evaluation methodology, desk study and organisation of case studies to Mozambique and Ghana, and conducted with the tax expert the case study in Peru.

METAC serves ten countries in the Middle East. The objective of the evaluation is to assess the extent to which METAC is achieving its objectives efficiently and effectively and whether TA delivered is sustainable. As Junior Evaluator, my main tasks included: organization of the field work, document and data analysis, survey design and development, data processing and survey reporting and preparation of technical annexes.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Andrea', 'last_name': 'Dijkstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Senior advisor at the Budget Inspectorate, Ministry of Finance (NL)'}]}, {'title': 'International Research by Students Programme', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'description': "Programme of the students' association of International Relations and International Organization Clio. Title: The road to Copenhagen: the influence of the economical effects of climate change on the negotiation positions. (Original title: De weg naar Kopenhagen: de invloed van de economische effecten van klimaatverandering op de onderhandelingsposities).
